name: Into The Nest
description:
Story:

After years of experiments gone wrong on mosquitos and other bugs in an attempt to find a cure for malaria White Sand's scientist have created the world's worst enemy to exist, Monster Bugs!

Carl a bio weapon specialist who works at White Sand Corp. has been assigned a mission to liberate the corporation's stations from the invading Monster Bugs across the world, Carl travels from WS's base in Antarctica to his first destination at the Grand Canyon, if he survives the mission will only get worse as he travels to the vast valleys of Barun in Nepal to eliminate the mother of all bugs !

Modifications Done for the Game:

  1. Complete UI Reskin
  2. Added new Terrain Textures and implemented them to create engaging Environments.
  3. New Weapon Pickups and Attributes.
